title: Esplais Catalans
text: Esplais Catalans is a non-religious and progressive <a href="Voluntary%20association">association</a> where volunteerism is our way of work to change the society. In the entity, the esplai is a citizen school for children, youth, families and leaders; a popular education way. Esplais Catalans is the result of the esplais’ and people's willingness to have exchanging, learning and join action places. Equality, freedom, associative participation, environmental education and Children's Rights are promoted in Esplais Catalans.
